---
title: "Associations Between 11 Forms of Discipline and Child Outcomes Across 60 Countries"
author:  Andy Grogan-Kaylor 
date: "2024-5-17"
categories: [multilevel, Bayes, corporal punishment]
image: "MICS.png"
---


Last Fall, we published an article entitled "Associations Between 11 Forms of Discipline and Child Outcomes Across 60 Countries" in *BMJ Open*:  [https://bmjopen.bmj.com/content/13/10/e058439](https://bmjopen.bmj.com/content/13/10/e058439)

I prepared an ArcGIS StoryMap summarizing that research--which is linked to [elsewhere on this website](../../research.qmd)--but realized that I wanted to link to it in this blog. For full screen view, click on [this link](https://websites.umich.edu/~parentingandchilddev/MICS-discipline-11-forms/v1/MICS-discipline-11-forms.html). 

You may also view the presentation below.
